original_text: “Oholah played the whore while she was mine, and she lusted after her lovers the Assyrians, warriors
korean_text: 오홀라가 내게 속하였을 때에 행음하여 그가 연애하는 자 곧 그의 이웃 앗수르 사람을 사모하였나니

sentences.original_text: Oholah played the whore while she was mine
and she lusted after her lovers the Assyrians, warriors
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그녀의 연인들인 앗수르 용사들을 탐내었다
